about.title: About us
about.content: Explore Laboratoires VIVACY: our expertise in aesthetic and anti-aging medicine, our premium product ranges, our commitment to innovation and safety, as well as our latest news and social initiatives. Discover our dedication to excellence and well-being.

innovations.title: Technologies
innovations.content: Explore Laboratoires VIVACY’s latest innovations: IPN-LIKE® for advanced formulations, Bi-SOFT for enhanced precision, VIVASÔME for cutting-edge skincare, and VIVACY SECURITY for guaranteed product authenticity. Discover how these technologies are transforming aesthetics and ensuring exceptional quality.

products.title: Brands
products.content: Discover Laboratoires VIVACY’s brands: STYLAGE® for aesthetic medicine, DESIRIAL® for intimate medicine, VIVACY BEAUTY for premium skincare, and MY VIVACY for product authenticity and safety.

professionals.title: Healthcare professionals
professionals.content: Explore our dedicated section for healthcare professionals. Access the VIVACY ACADEMY platform to benefit from specialized training and exclusive resources. Learn how VIVACY ACADEMY can enhance your skills and support your professional development.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Get in touch through our contact form and explore our global network. Discover how our international presence ensures that our advanced aesthetic solutions are accessible wherever you are.

section1.h3: Unlock the full power of ha
section1.text:
Laboratories VIVACY, based in Paris, are renowned pioneers of Hyaluronic Acid in the field of aesthetic medicine. With over 16 years of experience, VIVACY specializes in developing, manufacturing, and distributing injectable medical devices for healthcare professionals.

Their historical promise is to enhance the beauty of both women and men without altering their natural appearance. Therefore, VIVACY's mission is to provide practitioners worldwide with the highest quality, efficiency, and security in medical innovations.

section2.text:
VIVACY stands as a key player in the medical aesthetics market. Founded in 2007, this French company specializes in manufacturing dermal filler products based on hyaluronic acid, tailored specifically for aesthetic and anti-aging treatments. Laboratoires VIVACY distributes its products not only in France but also in over 75 other countries. Aesthetic doctors, surgeons, and dermatologists worldwide rely on VIVACY’s renowned STYLAGE® range. What sets it apart is its patented hyaluronic acid stabilization technology, ensuring long-lasting results. With 15 years of medical expertise, the STYLAGE® range holds a CE mark.

Available as transparent, absorbable gel formulations, these products cater precisely to patients’ diverse aesthetic requirements, including wrinkle filling, skin hydration, and loss of facial volume, among others. Your practitioner will devise a personalized treatment plan based on your specific needs, selecting the appropriate products to ensure optimal results.

keyNumbers.4: 1st injectable hyaluronic acid gel developed for women’s intimate health*

section4.textTop:
- IPN-LIKE TECHNOLOGY

TECHNOLOGY ON THE MOVE: HYALURONIC ACID, A “MOLECULE TO MOISTURIZE”
section4.textCore:
All VIVACY’s products are hyaluronic acid-based. Hyaluronic acid (HA) is a naturally occurring molecule in the human body, particularly in the skin and mucous membranes. It can retain up to 1,000 times its weight in water2, consequently contributing to the hydration and toning of the concerned tissues3.

HA has a short life span and is soluble in water, meaning it needs to be stabilised before injection into skin tissues. To do so, a special technical process called “cross-linking” is used to bind HA molecules together to obtain a cohesive HA gel for a skin smoothing, lifting and/or volumising effect that will last for several months. The duration of the treatment depends on many factors, such as the patient’s skin type and structure, age, lifestyle, the area treated and the injection technique used by the practitioner.

section7.text: Explore this global map to discover our international subsidiaries. VIVACY is committed to global expansion, providing advanced solutions in aesthetic medicine worldwide. With strategically located offices and a global distribution network, VIVACY is at your service wherever you are. Whether you’re a healthcare professional or a patient, our global presence ensures easy access to high-quality products and services. Check out this map to locate your local subsidiary.

vivacySecurity.h2: Vivacy is with you every day
vivacySecurity.content: Scan a product to verify its authenticity using RFID technology and access our digitized instructions. Explore our pre and post-injection advice for a serene treatment experience.

titles.appleStore: Download Vivacy security on App Store
titles.googlePlay: Download Vivacy security on Google Play

section1.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY stands out in aesthetic and anti-aging treatments with hyaluronic acid-based fillers, particularly the STYLAGE® range, renowned for its patented technology and long-lasting results. In 2011, VIVACY innovated in functional and aesthetic gynecology with the first injectable gel for vulvo-vaginal restoration.

Pursuing excellence, VIVACY offers premium skincare lines for women and men, developed with dermatologists and skin biology experts. These products use the VIVASÔME complex, which encapsulates active ingredients for optimal absorption by the skin.

Collaborating with over 250,000 doctors worldwide, VIVACY designs and tests its products in close cooperation with healthcare professionals. The company also supports dermatological research, scientific training, and social initiatives, reflecting a deep commitment to the medical community and patient well-being.

content.c1: The STYLAGE® range by Laboratoires VIVACY stands out with innovative solutions for diverse aesthetic needs. STYLAGE® S, M, and L are specifically formulated to fill wrinkles, while STYLAGE® Special Lips Lidocaine and STYLAGE® Lips Plus focus on hydrating and volumizing lips.
content.c2: To restore or enhance facial volumes, STYLAGE® offers XL, XL LIDOCAINE, and XXL versions. Lastly, STYLAGE® HYDRO and HYDROMAX are designed to improve skin hydration and elasticity. With these versatile products, STYLAGE® meets a wide range of needs for both patients and healthcare professionals.

content.c1: DESIRIAL® is specifically designed to restore hydration and firmness in the vulvo-vaginal area for women experiencing vaginal dryness. With innovative formulations incorporating hyaluronic acid and antioxidants, DESIRIAL® provides effective solutions to enhance comfort and improve quality of life for affected women.

section1.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY is a prominent player in the field of medical aesthetics and anti-aging. Established in 2007, this esteemed French company has rapidly specialized in creating, producing, and distributing cutting-edge medical devices based on hyaluronic acid. Operating primarily in France, Vivacy has expanded its reach across more than 75 countries globally, craving out a significant niche in the competitive landscape of medical aesthetic.

For over 16 years, Laboratoires VIVACY has demonstrated unwavering dedication to the development of injectable medical devices specifically tailored for healthcare professionals. The aim of the company is enhance the natural beauty of individuals, achieving remarkable results without drastic alterations. This core philosophy is deeply embedded in the brand’s identity and has been primordial in earning the trust of medical practitioners and patients.

section2.content:
Consequently, VIVACY is committed to providing practitioners worldwide with the finest medical innovations in terms of quality, effectiveness, and safety. Its product range encompasses three main categories:

  • STYLAGE® series focusing on facial aesthetics
  • DESIRIAL® line addressing gynecological applications
  • VIVACY BEAUTY range of dermo-cosmetic productsAdditionally

Laboratoires Vivacy manufactures hyaluronic acid gels for ophthalmic surgery like I-SPACE®, along with viscosupplementation products such as KARTILAGE® for treating knee osteoarthritis pain.

With its unparalleled expertise, VIVACY has cultivated an extensive portfolio of premium products featuring innovative medical properties. These injectable formulations are meticulously designed by expert teams and serve as the basis for numerous clinical studies.

section3.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY’s advanced production facility in Archamps, France, highlights the company’s dedication to excellence. Complying with strict EU medical device regulations, this facility ensures all products are safe and effective. These products are then distributed globally to meet the growing demand from aesthetic doctors and healthcare professionals.

Healthcare professionals around the world trust VIVACY’s hyaluronic acid products for their ability to enhance natural beauty subtly and effectively. This trust is based on the consistent quality and innovation of VIVACY’s offerings, making the company a leading partner in medical aesthetics and anti-ageing solutions.

section4.h2: Discovering the heart of laboratoires vivacy

quality.title: Quality
quality.content: For 16 years, Laboratoires VIVACY’s objective has always been to offer practitioners and patients the best products in terms of quality, performance and security. All products are meticulously manufactured in France at the advanced facility in Archamps Technopole, a hub of French research and innovation. Laboratoires VIVACY maintain complete control over every stage of production without compromise.

security.title: Security
security.content: Laboratoires VIVACY uses pharmaceutical-grade raw materials and operates in highly secure white rooms to ensure the purity and safety of the gel manufacturing process. Each syringe undergoes manual inspection by trained operators before market release.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.content: In its commitment to guaranteeing safe, quality products for practitioners and patients worldwide, Laboratoires VIVACY launched an innovative authentication system for the injectable products in 2017. Each box is equipped with a uniquely numbered RFID* chip to verify the origin of STYLAGE® or DESIRIAL® injectables and combat counterfeiting. Practitioners can verify product’s authenticity using the « MY VIVACY » mobile app.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.content: Laboratoires VIVACY have developed clinical studies for the injectable products to prove the good tolerance and efficiency when it comes to the desired results. All studies are conducted with expert oversight and patient panels managed by certified centers. The STYLAGE® range holds CE marking in Europe and certifications in several countries, supported by over 16 years of clinical experience.

section2.h2: Promoting well-being of people and the planet

first.content:
During the Odyssea event, 171 members of our VIVACY teams and associated distributors worldwide walked and ran to support this vital cause. For us, maintaining our commitment to this cause is crucial, as we shine a spotlight on women’s health and provide medical professionals with the knowledge and tools to shape a better future.

Together, we stand united in the fight against breast cancer.At VIVACY, we firmly believe in the importance of raising awareness about this disease and providing tangible support to initiatives working towards its eradication. Participating in events like Odyssea is a concrete way for us to demonstrate our solidarity and commitment to this crucial cause.

second.h2: Ethics at the heart of our actions
second.content:
At Laboratoires VIVACY, we take pride in our commitment to gender equality. The law for the Freedom to Choose One’s Professional Future of September 5, 2018, imposes on companies an obligation to achieve results regarding gender equality.

At VIVACY, gender parity is not just about legal compliance; it is a fundamental value that we nurture every day. We firmly believe that gender diversity is a strength that fuels our innovation and growth. Our commitment to gender parity is reflected in our outstanding rating of 99/100 on the Gender Equality Index for the year 2023.

third.content:
The Laboratoires VIVACY, aware of the current environmental challenges, have equipped their new industrial site with innovative ecological solutions. Featuring vegetated parking lots and a large-scale photovoltaic installation, this site stands out as one of the pioneers in sustainability in the Auvergne Rhône-Alpes region.

In partnership with local companies such as Syan’EnR, VOLTEC Solar, and EPC Solaire, VIVACY has installed no less than 830 solar panels on the site’s roof. This collaboration demonstrates VIVACY’s commitment to the development of renewable energies and the local economy.

fourth.content: The Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region supports part of Laboratoires VIVACY’s investments, which demonstrates their strong local presence. This financial support underscores the regional authorities’ confidence in the quality and innovation of Laboratoires VIVACY. Consequently, Laboratoires VIVACY continues to contribute to the economic dynamism of the region.  This partnership shows the importance of the biomedical industry in the Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes economic fabric.

section1.content: Our Research & Development laboratory, based in Archamps, is a site entirely dedicated to innovation in the fields of Anti-Aging and Aesthetics. It is here that our injectable products are born, designed and developed by a team of passionate experts.

section2.content: We invest 10% of our annual revenue in R&D, thus demonstrating our ongoing commitment to innovation. With 16 years of experience, we have developed a strong expertise in our field. Over the past 8 years, our production capacity has increased by 11-fold, reflecting our commitment to meeting the growing demand for our products.

first.h2: Innovation at the heart of vivacy
first.content: We are proud of our 2 patented technologies: IPN-Like and Bi-SOFT®, which exemplify our dedication to innovation and our pursuit of advanced solutions in the field of aesthetic injections. The IPN-Like technology enhances the durability and performance of our dermal fillers, while the Bi-SOFT® injection system provides practitioners with a more precise and comfortable injection experience.

second.h2: Building strong relations with physicians and patients
second.content:
Trust and reliability are the cornerstones of our relationship with healthcare professionals and patients. With over 7 million syringes sold worldwide between 2008 and 2018, we have established ourselves as a trusted partner in the field of aesthetic medicine. Our products are renowned for their safety and effectiveness, and they are used by practitioners around the globe.

This trust is built on a foundation of rigorous testing, quality control, and unwavering commitment to upholding the highest standards across all aspects of our operations.

section4.h2: Adapting to the needs of  anti-ageing market
section4.content: At Laboratoires VIVACY, we continue our investment in research and development. We understand that the fields of Anti-Ageing and Aesthetics are constantly evolving, and we strive to stay ahead by developing cutting-edge solutions that meet the changing needs of the market. Our dedication to quality is reflected in our products, designed to help our customers achieve their aesthetic goals with confidence.

section1.content: An expert in the use of hyaluronic acid in the anti-ageing and aesthetic medicine field for over 16 years, Laboratoires VIVACY also focuses on the well-being of women in matters of intimate health.

section2.content: In 2011, Laboratoires VIVACY revolutionized the field of aesthetic and functional gynecology by introducing on the market the very first injectable hyaluronic acid gel for female vulvovaginal restoration. This innovation provides a vital solution for women suffering from vaginal discomfort, chronic irritation, or pain during intercourse. This treatment helps to restore hydration and elasticity to the vaginal tissues, offering significant relief, and improving sexual health and overall comfort. By addressing these intimate health concerns, Laboratoires VIVACY encourages women to regain confidence and ameliorate their quality of life.

section3.content:
The Desirial range offers a variety of medical products tailored to the diverse needs of intimate medicine and guarantees revolutionary results.

Desirial® is primarily used for the treatment of vaginal dryness. It restores moisture and improves the elasticity of the vaginal tissues, thereby enhancing comfort and reducing symptoms of dryness that can lead to discomfort and irritation.

Desirial Plus® is specifically formulated for more severe cases of vulvo-vaginal atrophy and offers an intensive treatment. After menopause, women can suffer from atrophy, a condition that is characterized by the thinning, drying and inflammation of the vaginal walls. Desirial Plus® helps to rejuvenate and restore the vaginal tissues, alleviating symptoms and improving overall vaginal health.

section4.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY is committed to ensuring the highest standards of safety and quality of their products. The Desirial® range is administered by qualified healthcare professionals, such as aesthetic doctors or gynecologists who are trained in safe and precise injection techniques. This professional administration ensures that patients receive effective and reliable treatments.

Our dedication to rigorous research and development, along with their commitment to patient safety, has established the Desirial® range as a trusted and respected option in the field of intimate medicine. The company’s innovative solutions not only address physical symptoms but also contribute to the emotional and psychological well-being of women, helping them lead more comfortable and confident lives.

section5.content:
Beyond their product offerings, Laboratoires VIVACY is deeply committed to advancing women’s health. They continuously invest in research and development to further improve their treatments and address emerging needs in the field of intimate medicine. Their pioneering work in this area reflects a broader mission to provide women all over the world with effective solutions to intimate health issues that have long been overlooked or inadequately addressed.

Through education and awareness initiatives, Laboratoires VIVACY also strives to reduce the stigma associated with intimate health problems, encouraging more women to seek the treatment they need. By breaking down barriers and promoting open conversations about intimate health, we are helping to create a more supportive and informed healthcare environment for women.

section1.h2: Stylage® : excellence in aesthetic medicine and anti-ageing treatments
section1.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY’s STYLAGE® range embodies exigence in the field of aesthetic medicine. Founded in 2007, our brand has established itself as an undisputed leader, offering a comprehensive range of aesthetic and anti-aging treatments. Beyond our diverse product offerings, STYLAGE® is committed to the education and support of aesthetic professionals worldwide.

We provide comprehensive training programs and resources to ensure that practitioners can deliver the best possible outcomes for their patients. Our global network of experts and partners reflects our dedication to high quality and our position at the forefront of the aesthetic medicine field.

section2.h2: Commitment to provide educational support for physicians
section2.content:
We invest heavily in research and development to ensure that our products remain at the forefront of technology. Our dedicated team of scientists and researchers strive to push the boundaries of what is possible in the field of aesthetic treatments and continually explore new methods and formulas to enhance the efficacy, safety, and comfort of our products.

Our team collaborates with leading experts and institutions globally, ensuring that we stay up to date with the latest trends and breakthroughs in science and technology.

section3.content:
Our STYLAGE® range includes a variety of filling solutions tailored to every aesthetic need including volume restoration. These products are specifically formulated to restore lost facial volume3 and to provide a young and natural look. Wrinkle smoothing1 fillers target and smooth out wrinkles, thus helping create a rejuvenated and refreshed facial appearance.

Deep hydration improves the health1, elasticity and overall appearance of skin tissues. Lip embellishment and correction2 safely improves hydration and lip contour and increases volume4. Each product is designed to deliver optimal results for each and every need or desire that our clients might have and to make them feel more comfortable and confident in their own skin.

section4.content:
Safety and quality are paramount in all STYLAGE® products. Our flagship range is trusted by aesthetic doctors, surgeons, and dermatologists worldwide. This trust is based on our patented hyaluronic acid stabilization technology, which ensures long-lasting and natural-looking results.

With over 16 years of clinical experience, the STYLAGE® range has received CE marking in Europe, attesting to its compliance with the highest safety and quality standards and building our reputation as a leader in the aesthetic industry. Our commitment to safety and quality involves rigorous testing and advanced manufacturing, ensuring each batch of STYLAGE® exceeds industry standards.
section4.references:
• 1 Masson, F. Acide hyaluronique et hydratation cutanée. Annales de dermatologie, 2010 ; 137(1), 23-25
  • 2 Monnet-Corti, V. Antezack, A. Pignoly, M._Comment parfaire l’esthétique du sourire : toujours en rose !_L’Orthodontie française_2018 ; 89(1) : 71-80
  • 3 Saban, Y. Polselli, R._Anatomie du visage et du cou en chirurgie et cosmétologie _Elsevier Masson_2015
  • 4 Muller, C. Alouini, O. Chouvin, M._Objectif sourire : et si l’on s’intéressait aux lèvres ?_ L’Orthodontie française_2018 ; 89(1) : 21-40

section1.h2: Quality & safety : a part of the vivacy DNA
section1.content:
With the MYVIVACY app, scan a product to verify its authenticity using Radio Frequency Identification technology and access our digitized instructions. Explore our pre and post-injection advice for a serene treatment experience.

MYVIVACY: The app that accompanies you every day!

section2.content:
As a manufacturer, Laboratoires VIVACY pays particular attention to product security and no compromise is made. Our clients’ health and safety are our top priority: we know medical interventions are never something to take lightly and we believe that everyone has a right to know where the products that they are using come from. In keeping with this line of conduct, Laboratoires VIVACY decided to design an innovative traceability system in 2017 using Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) technology.

This system allows clients all over the world to verify the authenticity of their Laboratoires VIVACY products, such as STYLAGE® and DESIRIAL®, by scanning their tags with a smartphone via a dedicated application: « MYVIVACY” This feature allows our clients to access serial numbers and expiration dates and protects them from counterfeit products by guaranteeing the authenticity of our offerings.

section3.content:
Additionally, the MYVIVACY app provides users with comprehensive digitized instructions and valuable advice. Users can access detailed pre- and post-injection guidelines to prepare for their treatments and ensure optimal results. Pre-injection advice includes tips on avoiding medication and supplements that could cause bruising or bleeding and recommendations on skincare routines to optimize results, while post-injection guidance provides steps to care for the treated area, manage any potential side effects, and maintain the achieved results for as long as possible.

This holistic approach enhances the treatment experience, offering clients total peace of mind by providing the information and support they need for optimal aesthetic results. The MYVIVACY app is a testament to Laboratoires VIVACY’s philosophy of combining cutting-edge technology with practical, user-friendly features. This ensures that every client has access to the information and support they need, fostering a sense of trust in their aesthetic treatments.

Through MYVIVACY, Laboratoires VIVACY reaffirms its dedication to innovation, safety, and client satisfaction. The app serves as a reliable companion that offers support and information every step of the way to ensure that all users have a secure and informed aesthetic journey. This comprehensive approach underscores Laboratoires VIVACY’s position as a leader in the aesthetic industry, committed to delivering excellence through every facet of its operations.

section4.h2: An innovative solution for product authenticity

section1.h2: Vivacy beauty: explore our universe dedicated to dermo-cosmetics on our e-commerce site vivacy beauty
section1.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY offers a range of professional quality dermo cosmetic products based on expert and innovative formulas to complement aesthetic interventions and help men and women alike preserve their natural beauty beyond the doctor’s office.

Laboratoires VIVACY is committed to producing high-quality dermal treatments in the form of its premium range of cosmetic products called VIVACY BEAUTY. We strive to make professional skincare accessible by making our expertise in aesthetic medicine available to all through a comprehensive e-commerce website.

section2.content:
With over 16 years of experience, the brand decided to create professional quality dermo-cosmetic products to soothe the skin after an aesthetic medicine intervention, but also to preserve its youthful appearance in day-to-day life for people who are merely seeking to take care of their skin through an effective routine.

Offering a facecare routine to our clients was primordial for us to prolong the results of our treatments. More generally, having a good skincare is the first step to feel clean, confident and more at ease in one’s body, and our products are designed by professionals with this goal in mind.

section3.h2: Comprehensive solutions for every skin type
section3.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY offers three distinct ranges of skincare products to meet all needs. The Vivacy Beauty range for women was created to complement our fillers and ensure long-lasting results with anti-aging, repairing, refreshing, and nourishing products. It also makes the VIVACY expertise accessible through easy-to-use products that protect the skin from harmful external elements such as the wind, sun, and artificial blue light.

The Monsieur Skincare range is specially designed for men, providing a complete skincare routine with various creams, serums, and an after-shave cream to ensure healthy and revitalized skin. Finally, our fragrance range adds a touch of luxury and sophistication with elegant and refined scents. These three ranges, each specialized and innovative, meet all the demands of our clients and patients.

section4.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY offers three distinct ranges of skincare products to meet all needs. The Vivacy Beauty range for women was created to complement our fillers and ensure long-lasting results with anti-aging, repairing, refreshing, and nourishing products. It also makes the VIVACY expertise accessible through easy-to-use products that protect the skin from harmful external elements such as the wind, sun, and artificial blue light.

The Monsieur Skincare range is specially designed for men, providing a complete skincare routine with various creams, serums, and an after-shave cream to ensure healthy and revitalized skin. Finally, our fragrance range adds a touch of luxury and sophistication with elegant and refined scents. These three ranges, each specialized and innovative, meet all the demands of our clients and patients.

BiSoft.title: Bi-soft® injection technology1

section1.content:
In its continuing quest for innovative excellence in the medical aesthetic market, Laboratoires VIVACY has developed a unique delivery system, Bi-SOFT® Injection Technology. This state-of-the-art syringe offers greater precision and comfort, specifically designed to offer greater precision and comfort.

It is specifically designed to help practitioners in their daily practice of aesthetic treatments. The system’s ergonomic design and advanced features ensure that it stands out as a significant advancement in injection technology.

97% of practitioners are extremely satisfied with the use of BI-SOFT® injection system2. This statistic reflects the confidence and appreciation users have for the performance of this technology and its reliability in meeting practitioner expectations and improving procedural outcomes.

fourth.title: Control of injection depth
fourth.alt: Bi-Soft technology control of injection depth

content.second: Top-down blue graduations for better readability.

content.first: Reduction of the injection force sensation.
content.second: Provides extra grip and stability between the surface of the syringe and the gloves.

content.first: Made of polycarbonate and thermoplastic elastomer (TPE)
content.fourth: Designed in 4 different colours to differentiate between the products

content.first: Ergonomic design for increased practitioner comfort.
content.second: A larger oval grip plate<sup>3</sup> for better handling of the syringe and easier product administration.
content.third: Easy toppling, which facilitates smoother and more controlled injections.

content.first: The optimized center of gravity of the Bi-SOFT® Injection Technology ensures a balanced and stable grip, reducing the risk of hand fatigue during procedures. This feature is particularly beneficial for practitioners performing multiple injections, as it enhances overall efficiency and comfort.
content.second: By addressing these key areas—handling ability, bi-material technology, precise and secure injection, injection volume control, and optimized center of gravity—Bi-SOFT® Injection Technology sets a new standard in the field of medical aesthetics.
content.third: It combines cutting-edge materials with an intuitive design, providing a tool that not only meets but exceeds the high demands of modern aesthetic procedures. This innovation by Laboratoires VIVACY is a testament to our commitment to enhancing both practitioner performance and patient outcomes through superior technology.

BiSoft.references:
• 1. Laboratoires VIVACY (France). Optimised centre of gravity syringue. WO2018/185406 A1. 2018.
  • 2. A customer satisfaction survey of 97 practitioners from 5 European countries. 2018 Laboratoires VIVACY data.
  • 3. Plunger: Grip plate surface increased by 80% compared to conventional syringes. Finger Grip: Grip surface increased by 90% compared to conventional syringes

IpnLike.title: IPN-LIKE® technology

section1.content:
All VIVACY’s products are hyaluronic acid-based. Hyaluronic acid (HA) is a naturally occurring molecule in the human body, particularly in the skin and mucous membranes. It can retain up to 1,000 times its weight in water2, consequently contributing to the hydration and toning of the concerned tissues3.

HA has a short life span and is soluble in water, meaning it needs to be stabilised before injection into skin tissues. To do so, a special technical process called “cross-linking” is used to bind HA molecules together to obtain a cohesive HA gel for a skin smoothing, lifting and/or volumising effect that will last for several months.

The duration of the treatment depends on many factors, such as the patient’s skin type and structure, age, lifestyle, the area treated, and the injection technique used by the practitioner.

section2.content:
Laboratoires VIVACY has developed “IPN-Like Technology” (InterPenetrated Networks), a unique cross-linking technology for hyaluronic acid that accurately defines each product’s viscoelastic properties4 : From a clinical standpoint, the main product characteristics sought after by Physicians are their ability to lift skin tissues, provide mechanical support and spread easily. To obtain these desired effects, the HA gel must have a unique combination of elasticity and viscosity5 . These specific viscoelastic properties determine where the gel will be injected, allowing it to respond to the various mechanical stresses to which it will be subjected in the tissues. As a result, the interpenetration of HA cross-linked networks4:

  • Optimises the products’ rheology, in particular the viscosity to guarantee good product injectability.
  • Preserves the partial independence of the interpenetrated HA networks, whilst increasing the density of chemical nodes.
  • Guarantees the cohesion of the HA gel and its monophasic properties.

section3.content:
The use of IPN-Like Technology in VIVACY’s HA products not only ensures superior hydration and structural support but also promotes natural-looking results that last longer.

This advanced cross-linking technique is designed to integrate seamlessly with the patient’s tissue, minimizing the risk of adverse reactions and ensuring a smooth, even distribution of the product. Patients can expect improved skin texture, elasticity, and a reduction in fine lines and wrinkles, resulting in a youthful and rejuvenated appearance.

section4.content:
VIVACY’s commitment to innovation and excellence is demonstrated by its research and development efforts. Our team of scientists continuously work on refining and enhancing the IPN-Like Technology to meet the evolving needs of patients and healthcare professionals alike.

As the demand for non-surgical cosmetic treatments continues to grow, VIVACY’s innovative approach positions it as a leader in providing safe, effective, and aesthetically pleasing solutions. This dedication to research and innovation ensures that the brand remains at the forefront of aesthetic medicine, providing cutting-edge solutions that deliver natural-looking high-quality results.

IpnLike.references:
• 1-apakonstantinou, E. & Al. Hyaluronic acid - A key molecule in skin aging. Dermato-Endocrinology 4:3, 253–258; July–December 2012.
  • 2-Ulf Anderegg, J. C. S. & Al. More than just a filler – the role of hyaluronan for skin homeostasis. Experimental Dermatology, 2014, 23, 295–303.
  • 3-Becker, L. C. & Al. “Final Report of the Safety Assessment of Hyaluronic Acid, Potassium Hyaluronate, and Sodium Hyaluronate” International Journal of Toxicology, 2009, volume 28 Number 4S, 5-67.
  • 4-IPN-Like Technology Patent delivered WO2009/071697 in 2008.
  • 5-undaram, H. & Al., “Biophysical characteristics of hyaluronic acid soft-tissue fillers and their relevance to aesthetic applications”. American Society of Plastic Surgeons, Plast. Reconstr. Surg. 132: 5S, 2013.

section1.content: With extensive expertise in Aesthetic Medicine and anti-ageing solutions, Laboratoires VIVACY have collaborated with cosmetology experts and dermatologists to develop a professional line of dermo-cosmetics centered around the exclusive VIVASÔME® complex*. This innovative complex incorporates hyaluronic acid and antioxidants to offer advanced skincare solutions.

section2.content: The VIVASÔME® complex represents a breakthrough in skincare technology, offering advanced solutions that not only maintain but enhance the quality of all skin types on a daily basis. It is specially formulated to soothe and protect the skin, particularly after aesthetic medical treatments, ensuring comprehensive care.
section2.contentBis: Central to the effectiveness of the VIVASÔME® complex is its active encapsulation technology utilizing liposomes. These microscopic lipid-based spheres mimic the skin’s natural hydro-lipid film, facilitating the efficient penetration of active ingredients deep into the skin’s layers. This innovative approach ensures that key nutrients and antioxidants are delivered precisely to targeted cells, maximizing their efficacy.

section3.h3: At the heart of our formulas
section3.content:
• Treignac Mineral Water: Known for its low mineral content, Treignac Mineral Water helps maintain optimal skin hydration, essential for skin health and vitality. Its unique properties make it a high-quality base for the VIVASÔME® complex and ensures that the skin remains well-hydrated and balanced.
  • Sorbitol: With its antioxidant properties, sorbitol is able to trap free radicals, which are responsible for skin ageing. This ingredient plays a crucial role in protecting the skin from oxidative stress, thereby preserving its youthful appearance.
  • Boosters of Hyaluronic Acid and Collagen: These active ingredients are the precursors for the production of hyaluronic acid and collagen, which are compounds that give the skin its anti-ageing properties. By stimulating the natural synthesis of these essential components, the VIVASÔME® complex helps maintain the skin’s firmness and elasticity.

section4.content:
• Hyaluronic Acid: Specifically selected for its low molecular weight, hyaluronic acid penetrates deeply into the skin, replenishing moisture and improving skin texture and resilience. It is instrumental in reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. This deeply hydrating ingredient is a cornerstone of anti-ageing skincare, providing lasting moisture and a plumping effect.
  • Stabilized Vitamin C: This ingredient is a strong antioxidant. It is known to protect the skin from the stress of oxidisation caused by free radicals, generated during the physiological ageing process. Its stabilised form helps prolong its effectiveness.

section5.content: Discover the effectiveness of the VIVASÔME® complex and elevate your skincare routine with scientifically advanced formulations for immediate and long-term anti-ageing benefits.

Contact.legal: In accordance with applicable regulations, you have a right of access to, a right of rectification and, for legitimate grounds, a right to object to your data being used for commercial marketing purposes, a right of limitation, a right to erasure and a right to the portability of the data you have transmitted to us, by sending a signed and dated letter to Laboratoires VIVACY, 44 rue Paul Valéry 75116 Paris, France or an e-mail to dpo@vivacy.fr. Your application must be accompanied by a copy of your ID document. You may lodge a complaint with the CNIL (France) if you consider your personal data has been breached under the applicable regulations relating to the protection of personal data. For further information, you may consult our Privacy Policy.
Contact.checked: I agree that the data I have provided will be used by VIVACY for the purpose of contacting me. The data collected in this form will be processed by VIVACY, the data controller, for the following purposes: managing and processing your contact request and commercial marketing via email and phone.. Answers marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory. If you do not reply, we will not be able to process your request.
